name: Desert Prison Yard Sniper Pro
description: Come & plan a strategy to secure the city. Those prisoner belong to a crime bay area & they are doing crime in yard too.You can play as an assassin sniper. Your mission in this shooting game to kill the killing gangsters. This criminal Game involving jail break rules & real simulation of commando shooting at Jail break is not an easy mission but these prisoners are very dangerous & they want to escape from prison, they have weapons with them also.
